overview: Somewhere In The Stratosphere: Madness Live from Washington State (Electric) is a full electric live set from platinum recording group Shinedown. Shinedown's live performances give an unsparing look into the soul and psyche amidst a fierce musical attack that, even in its quieter moments, vibrate with the passion, energy and focus of a band with high-minded ideals and limitless ambitions.
title: Shinedown: Madness from Washington State
